scoreboard.title: Scoreboard
scoreboard.description: Record Crit, Tac, and Kill Op VP each turning point, then reveal primaries to add the bonus at the end of the battle.
scoreboard.quickReference1: Score up to 2 VP each turning point for both Crit and Tac ops (starting at TP2).
scoreboard.quickReference2: Kill Op VP unlock as enemy operatives are incapacitated following the kill grade chart.
scoreboard.quickReference3: When primaries are revealed, add half of the total VP from the chosen op (rounded down).
scoreboard.quickReference4: Use the reset button at any time to clear both cards and begin a new match.

sequence.title: Game Sequence
sequence.description: Step through every phase of the Kill Team 2024 round sequence with clear reference text for each action.
